title: The Job of an Imperial Concubine - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Harem   Historical   Josei   Mature   Mystery
tags: Ancient China   Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Imperial Harem   Lucky Protagonist   Manipulative Characters   Modern Knowledge   Nobles   Older Love Interests   Power Struggle   Pregnancy   Romantic Subplot   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Secretive Protagonist   Seduction   Transmigration   Transplanted Memories   Underestimated Protagonist   Wealthy Characters
author: Butterfly's Shadow Beneath the Moon   Yue Xia Die Ying   月下蝶影
description:
To pass as an imperial concubine, one must be professional.

Actually, the profession of an imperial concubine is pretty good. The emperor will accompany you in eating and drinking, and even pay you for it. What’s not good about that?>
